content: अराल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ऋ-विच् अरं आलाति, लाक] Spreading like the spokes of a wheel, curved, crooked; पादावरालांगुली <ls>M. 2. 3.</ls> --लः {@--1@} A bent or crooked arm. {@--2@} The resin of the plant Shorea Robusta (सर्जरस). {@--3@} An elephant in rut. --ला {@--1@} An unchaste woman, harlot, courtezan. {@--2@} A modest woman (अधृष्टा).
